Waitara car stolen with baby inside: Police name man they’re looking for in relation to Taranaki incident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-stolen-with-baby-inside-police-name-man-theyre-looking-for-in-relation-to-taranaki-incident/XVBTYS66CZFPHKCX5MLOKRQPB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-stolen-with-baby-inside-police-name-man-theyre-looking-for-in-relation-to-taranaki-incident/XVBTYS66CZFPHKCX5MLOKRQPB4/ The man is believed to still be in the Taranaki area. Police confirmed 'the charges filed against Smith relate to the incident in Waitara last Friday'. Photo / Police
